review: Easy to setup and works perfectly.
author: chelsea carpenter

review: Before purchasing, I heard the Fire TV stick was slower than the Fire TV. I only have the stick, so I cannot compare, but I am very pleased with the speed of the Fire TV stick.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Simply Amazing.  The user interface is exceptional and the speed is nothing short of BLAZING!!
author: Donald

review: Nice.  Easy to set up and very capable.  I'm enjoying it so far.
author: Amazon Customer "To say can't is to fail before you begin"

review: Installed easy - online instructions difficult to follow for all features. Still it performs well and when you learn all it's features should be valuable addition to your video enjoyment.
author: GPR
